mapper.select: select crewmembers.userNo, crewmembers.crewNO, crews.name, crewmembers.role, crewmembers.status, DATE_FORMAT(crewmembers.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(crewmembers.updatedAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updatedAt, crews.city, crews.district, crews.runningDay, crews.status from crewmembers left join crews on crewmembers.crewNO = crews.no where userNo=${param1};

select crewmembers.crewNO, crews.name, crewmembers.userNo, users.nickName, crewmembers.role, crewmembers.status, DATE_FORMAT(crewmembers.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, crews.no, crews.status from crewmembers left join crews on crewmembers.crewNO = crews.no left join users on crewmembers.userNO = users.no where crewNo in (select crewNo from crewmembers where userNo=${param1});
